Sentence.value: Learning that your child has cancer can feel overwhelming and scary.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: Learning that your [[child|C0008059]] has [[cancer|C0006826]] can feel overwhelming and scary.

Sentence.value: Here are some things to know when talking with a child about having cancer.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: Here are some things to know when talking with a [[child|C0008059]] about having [[cancer|C0006826]].

Sentence.value: But all children with cancer need to know that they have cancer.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: But all [[children|C0008059]] with [[cancer|C0006826]] need to know that they have [[cancer|C0006826]].

Sentence.value: - Visit with other children who have had cancer.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: - Visit with other [[children|C0008059]] who have had [[cancer|C0006826]].

Sentence.value: Ask your doctor to put you in touch with other families who have successfully coped with cancer.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: Ask your doctor to put you in touch with other [[families|C0015576]] who have successfully coped with [[cancer|C0006826]].
